abstract.t: The RObust Header Compression WG (ROHC) is developing compressionschemes initially for IP/UDP/RTP header compression [ROHC]. The groupis also chartered to develop compression for IP/TCP and after re-chartering it is possible (probable) that also compression of otherprotocols will follow. Compression and decompression must alwaysfollow well defined rules but there exist a number of variables thatwill affect details in the way compression should be carried out andhow these rules are set. The purpose of this document is to identifysuch variables and outline a way to make ROHC both adaptable tovarious conditions and possible to extend for future needs.
